channel.title: [ DDS Special ]
channel.description:
Hey, I was just wondering how to fix the DDS special on a DeltaScape source. Right now, there's a delay before each attack.
I've seen a tutorial somewhere, but can't seem to find it.
Any help would be appreciated.
(If you find a link to a tutorial, PM it to me please.)
